    • Constructor Detail

      • Room

        public Room​(java.lang.String pName,
            java.lang.String pDescription,
            java.lang.String pImage)
        Creates a new room with the given description. Also, creates the hashmap to store all the exits.
        Parameters:
        pName - Room's name to reference it in other commands for instance
        pDescription - Room's description that will be displayed
        pImage - Room's image file's path

        Sets the exit of a room to the HashMap.
        Parameters:
        pDirection - The direction of the exit
        pNeighbor - The Room we want to set the exit to

      • getExit

        public Room getExit​(java.lang.String pDirection)
        Permits to get the exit of the given room.
        Parameters:
        pDirection - The direction you want to go further.
        Returns:
        The Room corresponding to the direction OR if the direction is not one of the 5 possible directions, it returns the UNKNOWN_ROOM.

      • verifDirection

        public boolean verifDirection​(java.lang.String pDirection)
        Permits to verify whether a direction is one of the 5 possible ones or not.
        Parameters:
        pDirection - The direction you want to verify.
        Returns:
        A boolean value telling if it's a right direction.

      • getExitString

        public java.lang.String getExitString()
        Getting all the possible exits from a Room.
        Returns:
        A String with all the possible exits splitted with a space.
